block.p: Karen Lynn Hirschfield, the daughter of Gerard A. Hirschfield of Tarzana, Calif., and the late Ruth Hirschfield, is to be married today to Mark Lindsey Safire, the son of Helene Safire and the columnist William Safire of Chevy Chase, Md. Rabbi Jonathan Maltzman will officiate at the home of the bridegroom's parents in Harpers Ferry, W.Va.

The bride, 40, is a personal fitness trainer and a yoga teacher in New York. From 1994 to 1998, she was a Rockette at Radio City Music Hall. Before that, she was a modern dancer and a teacher at Jennifer Muller/The Works, a dance company in New York. Her father is a psychotherapist in Los Angeles and the author of ''My Ego, My Higher Power and I'' (Hi Productions, 1999). Her mother was a computer-systems analyst in Los Angeles.
